d(x,y).desc: shortest path distance from vertices x to y

\\sigma(x,y).desc: number of shortest paths from vertices x to y

\\sigma(x,y|z).desc: number of shortest paths from vertices x to y that pass through that pass through z

d(x).desc: degree of x (number of neighbors of x)

d_{out}(x).desc: out degree of x (number of outgoing edges of x)

d_{in}(x).desc: in degree of x (number of incomming edges of x)
